title: NFL Around the League: September 4th, 2013
itunes:title: NFL Around the League: September 4th, 2013
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling preview the Thursday night regular season opener between the Baltimore Ravens and the Denver Broncos. The crew also breaks down the latest headlines from around the league before giving you their Super Bowl predictions. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL .

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
